text: So far, I have one published board game design, '18 India'. Playing, and designing, strategy board games keeps the mind sharp.
Yoga keeps me flexible and strengthens the mind as well as the body.
I alternate my workouts between riding my Peloton bike and power walking on the treadmill.
My son and I enjoy hiking. We dream of hiking part of the Camino de Santiago. Maybe one day.
I enjoy reading about history. I especially like military history and learning more and more about the American Civil War and World War 2.
